NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 IDAEA: I am surprised to see you here today, Pye. I did not think you would be remotely interested in a test concerning the safety of our clan and the star system. 2 1 PYE: Must we fight again on such a momentous day, Idaea? 3 2 PYE: Let us enjoy the stars while we wait for the warp tower to activate. In silence. 4 3 IDAEA: ..I apologize, Pye. That statement was uncalled for. 5 4 PYE: Recall my promise, Idaea; I swore to you that I would not support the Sun Station's use, unless we were sure it would not cause destruction. 6 5 IDAEA: Your stance seems to fluctuate time to time, in my defense. 7 6 IDAEA: Nevertheless, I truly pray the test today will give all of us the solace and confidence we need to follow in our ambitions. 8 7 PYE: Goodness! Has it always taken this long for this warp tower to activate? 9 8 PYE: Every time I think the planet will finally align with the warp tower, it starts to go into retrograde! 10 9 IDAEA: Unfortunately, the farther out a planet is, the harder it is for the warp tower to align due to the Hourglass Twins' orbit.. We must simply be patient. 11 10 IDAEA: Ah, the alignment is happening at last! Come, Pye: The Deep Storm Station awaits us. Tower EX2 6
